modName: Wrath of the North - Stormcloaks gear re-mastered
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][color=blue][u][b][size=+3]Wrath of the North - Stormcloaks gear re-mastered[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WsX2y5kl.jpg[/IMG]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]About this Mod[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]This mod offers a quality texture makeover for the vanilla Stormcloak gear, which aims at enhancing the vanilla look to make it more visually pleasant, by adding details and making the colours more vibrant, so that it blends well with other popular texture enhancements and Stormcloak mods like the wonderful Stormlord armor.

It is the sister mod to my popular Imperial texture overhaul :

[URL=http://imgur.com/NEVhhIv][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NEVhhIvs.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34321]Virtus Imperii - Armour and Weapons[/url]

The textures are professionally compressed and have the same size like Beth\'s official HD DLC. I have also added versions for CBBE and UNP body replacers. The standard version should work with all other body conversions, skimpy variants etc.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I have the honour to have some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as regular beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Video Reviews[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[youtube]JXAw9ErW_jE[/youtube]
by hodilton

[youtube]sub_8fXY-XI[/youtube]
by Brodual

[youtube]iHSsAGDMJ5M[/youtube]
by silverthorne11



[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Skyrim 1.9+ is required for this mod to work.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]

Download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data and say \"yes\" when being asked to integrate and override.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Un-installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Delete the file via NMM or manually by deleting the files contained in the mod folder within your Skyrim \"Textures\" folder.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]The mod has no compatibility issues, except other mods that modify Stormcloaks textures.[/size][/color]



[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Completion Status[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]

Male Stormcloak Armor - done
Female Stormcloak Armor - done
Stormcloak Shield - Done
Stormcloak Officer Armor - WIP
[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Credits[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Credits go to...

- Exeter for UNP and UNPB meshes
- Caliente for CBBE meshes
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim, Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC and the HD texture packs
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the  day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of friends and beta testers :[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Permissions[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.[/size][/color]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the \"Credits\" section. Enjoy it![/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Author\'s note[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation and endorse it, leave a comment or load up a picture - I\'d be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you enjoy a mod a few clicks should not be too much to ask for. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution.[/size][/color]
author: EcthelionOtW
